lead_paragraph: Gov. C. L. Otter said he was concerned with the number of children who had died in Idaho because their parents had chosen faith healing for religious reasons over medical assistance.

headline.print_headline: Idaho: Governor Wants to Investigate Deaths Among Faith-Healing Adherents
headline.main: Idaho: Governor Wants to Investigate Deaths Among Faith Healing Adherents

snippet: Gov. C. L. Otter said he was concerned with the number of children who had died in Idaho because their parents had chosen faith healing for religious reasons over medical assistance.
abstract: Idaho Gov C L Otter expresses concern about reports of number of children dying in state because parents chose faith healing over medical assistance; asks state House and Senate to create committee to study issue.
